mapper.select:
SELECT comment_num, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'MM/DD HH24:MI') reg_date, post_num, id, anonymous, mem_num, like_cntR, photoname FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT f.comment_num, content, f.reg_date, f.post_num, id, f.anonymous, f.mem_num, like_cntR, photoname FROM freeboard_comment f LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) like_cntR,comment_num FROM freeboard_like_comment GROUP BY comment_num)c ON f.comment_num = c.comment_num JOIN member m ON f.mem_num=m.mem_num JOIN member_detail d ON m.mem_num=d.mem_num WHERE post_num = #{post_num} ORDER BY comment_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM freeboard f WHERE post_num=#{post_num} (select comment_num FROM freeboard_comment c WHERE c.post_num = f.post_num )
